meanings.sent1: The robot was a nonhumans creation.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the company of nonhumans characters in the story.
meanings.sent3: The alien found the concept of nonhumans fascinating.
meanings.sent4: His nonhumans behavior made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the nonhumans forest sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.definition: Animals, plants, or other organisms that are not human
meanings.sent1: The zoo was filled with nonhumans of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent2: She studied nonhumans in her biology class.
meanings.sent3: The nonhumans in the garden seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The nonhumans of the sea danced gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent5: The nonhumans of the forest whispered secrets to each other in the wind.
